B

board() - Static method in class Tic
board() is an array of chars that keeps track of what squares the players have chosen.

I

isDraw() - Static method in class Tic
isDraw() is a boolean function that checks if the game is a draw.
isWinner() - Static method in class Tic
isWinner() is a function that checks after each turn if the player has won the game.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TicServer
 

P

player() - Static method in class Tic
player() is a function that returns activePlayer

R

reset() - Method in class TicServer
 

T

Tic - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Tic() - Constructor for class Tic
Tic() is a constructor that doesn't take in any parameters and doesn't return anything.
TicServer - Class in <Unnamed>
Tic Tac Toe
TicServer() - Constructor for class TicServer
 

U

updateBoard(int) - Static method in class Tic
updateBoard() checks if the square the player chose already has been chosen, if not it marks it with the players sign, makes the other player the active one and increases the turn counter by one.
